name: Particular Particles
description:
A game made exclusively using Unity's particle system

It's a pretty simple but fun endless runner. Press A or the left arrow on your keyboard to move left, and press D or the right arrow on your keyboard to move right. You control the red flame, and the blue flame mirrors your actions.

Send me screenshots of bugs on twitter so people can publically laugh at me @badduck32

Enjoy the game! My high score is 146, make sure to post your high scores in the comments!! (partly because you can't save scores in HTML games)
